java/liquibase/change/AddColumnChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.DB2Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.Database;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.*;
00006 import liquibase.database.structure.Column;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00009 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00010 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00011 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00012 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00013 
00014 import java.util.*;
00015 
00019 public class AddColumnChange extends AbstractChange {
00020 
00021     private String schemaName;
00022     private String tableName;
00023     private List<ColumnConfig> columns;
00024 
00025     public AddColumnChange() {
00026         super("addColumn", "Add Column");
00027         columns = new ArrayList<ColumnConfig>();
00028     }
00029 
00030     public String getSchemaName() {
00031         return schemaName;
00032     }
00033 
00034     public void setSchemaName(String schemaName) {
00035         this.schemaName = schemaName;
00036     }
00037 
00038     public String getTableName() {
00039         return tableName;
00040     }
00041 
00042     public void setTableName(String tableName) {
00043         this.tableName = tableName;
00044     }
00045 
00046     public List<ColumnConfig> getColumns() {
00047         return columns;
00048     }
00049 
00050     public ColumnConfig getLastColumn() {
00051         return (columns.size() > 0) ? columns.get(columns.size() - 1) : null;
00052     }
00053 
00054     public void addColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00055         columns.add(column);
00056     }
00057 
00058     public void removeColumn(ColumnConfig column) {
00059         columns.remove(column);
00060     }
00061 
00062     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00063         List<SqlStatement> sql = new ArrayList<SqlStatement>();
00064 
00065         String schemaName = getSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getSchemaName();
00066         for (ColumnConfig aColumn : columns) {
00067             Set<ColumnConstraint> constraints = new HashSet<ColumnConstraint>();
00068             if (aColumn.getConstraints() != null) {
00069                 if (aColumn.getConstraints().isNullable() != null && !aColumn.getConstraints().isNullable()) {
00070                     constraints.add(new NotNullConstraint());
00071                 }
00072             }
00073 
00074             AddColumnStatement addColumnStatement = new AddColumnStatement(schemaName,
00075                     getTableName(),
00076                     aColumn.getName(),
00077                     aColumn.getType(),
00078                     aColumn.getDefaultValueObject(),
00079                     constraints.toArray(new ColumnConstraint[constraints.size()]));
00080 
00081             sql.add(addColumnStatement);
00082 
00083             if (aColumn.getValueObject() != null) {
00084                 UpdateStatement updateStatement = new UpdateStatement(schemaName, getTableName());
00085                 updateStatement.addNewColumnValue(aColumn.getName(), aColumn.getValueObject());
00086                 sql.add(updateStatement);
00087             }
00088         }
00089 
00090         for (ColumnConfig aColumn : columns) {
00091             if (aColumn.getConstraints() != null) {
00092                 if (aColumn.getConstraints().isPrimaryKey() != null && aColumn.getConstraints().isPrimaryKey()) {
00093                     AddPrimaryKeyChange change = new AddPrimaryKeyChange();
00094                     change.setSchemaName(schemaName);
00095                     change.setTableName(getTableName());
00096                     change.setColumnNames(aColumn.getName());
00097 
00098                     sql.addAll(Arrays.asList(change.generateStatements(database)));
00099                 }
00100             }
00101         }
00102 
00103         if (database instanceof DB2Database) {
00104             sql.add(new ReorganizeTableStatement(schemaName, getTableName()));
00105         }
00106 
00107         return sql.toArray(new SqlStatement[sql.size()]);
00108     }
00109 
00110     protected Change[] createInverses() {
00111         List<Change> inverses = new ArrayList<Change>();
00112 
00113         for (ColumnConfig aColumn : columns) {
00114             if (aColumn.hasDefaultValue()) {
00115                 DropDefaultValueChange dropChange = new DropDefaultValueChange();
00116                 dropChange.setTableName(getTableName());
00117                 dropChange.setColumnName(aColumn.getName());
00118 
00119                 inverses.add(dropChange);
00120             }
00121 
00122 
00123             DropColumnChange inverse = new DropColumnChange();
00124             inverse.setSchemaName(getSchemaName());
00125             inverse.setColumnName(aColumn.getName());
00126             inverse.setTableName(getTableName());
00127             inverses.add(inverse);
00128         }
00129 
00130         return inverses.toArray(new Change[inverses.size()]);
00131     }
00132 
00133     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00134         List<String> names = new ArrayList<String>(columns.size());
00135         for (ColumnConfig col : columns) {
00136             names.add(col.getName() + "(" + col.getType() + ")");
00137         }
00138 
00139         return "Columns " + StringUtils.join(names, ",") + " added to " + tableName;
00140     }
00141 
00142     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00143         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement("addColumn");
00144         if (getSchemaName() != null) {
00145             node.setAttribute("schemaName", getSchemaName());
00146         }
00147         node.setAttribute("tableName", getTableName());
00148 
00149         for (ColumnConfig col : getColumns()) {
00150             Element subNode = col.createNode(currentChangeLogFileDOM);
00151             node.appendChild(subNode);
00152         }
00153 
00154         return node;
00155     }
00156 
00157     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00158         List<DatabaseObject> result = new ArrayList<DatabaseObject>(columns.size());
00159 
00160         Table table = new Table(getTableName());
00161         result.add(table);
00162         for (ColumnConfig aColumn : columns) {
00163             Column each = new Column();
00164             each.setTable(table);
00165             each.setName(aColumn.getName());
00166             result.add(each);
00167         }
00168 
00169         return new HashSet<DatabaseObject>(result);
00170     }
00171 }
